types.html:
gniape f (plural gniapes)

  1. (Louisiana) Something that is added, especially something that a merchant gives to a buyer to complete the amount requested, or something extra given as a bonus; a gratuity, lagniappe
    Ce que j’en demande ? répondit le marchand ; pshaw ! je demande qu’on m’en débarrasse : prenez-la pour la gniape. ― What I'm asking? answered the merchant; pshaw! I am asking that you leave me alone: take it as a lagniappe
trans: Something that is added, especially something that a merchant gives to a buyer to complete the amount requested, or something extra given as a bonus
